title: Pork Chops with Honey-Garlic Sauce
directions: In a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray, cook pork chops over medium heat until a thermometer reads 145Â°, 5-6 minutes on each side. Remove; let stand 5 minutes. Combine remaining ingredients; add to pan. Cook over medium heat 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve with chops. Yield: 4 servings.
ingredients: 4 bone-in pork loin chops (6 ounces each)
